pages.text: Curiously, the combination of mushrooms and water is a perfect receptor for all forms of other bloomy notes, either rounding the taste, or creating... very peculiar ones.$(br2)Each flower has a specific effect, as if you would feed it to a $(thing)Brown Mooshroom$().

pages.title: Titration Recipe
pages.text: The fermentation process in colored wood makes the effect last quite a bit longer than $(item)Suspicious Stew$().
